sense.name: honor with or be a memorial
sense.examples: The sculpture commemorates Lincoln's only visit to the city in April 1865. We commemorated the dead with a memorial to Renato Beluche.

sense.name: mark by ceremony, call to remembrance
sense.examples: They commemorated the anniversary by joining in demonstrations for peace that mobilized citizens all across the world. Not long ago, we commemorated the anniversary of the September 11th terrorist attacks. Saturday commemorated the anniversary of when the final spike was driven into the railroad ties of the first transcontinental railroad.
